note:
dealing with the furballs stealing my letters is exhausting.
https://www.wattpad.com/user/Catatemypoem
#writer #poetry #bookworm #books #novelist

Terminal scholar of lit and bibliophile who collects new hobbies constantly. I love gardening, writing, photography, SF, and the ghost story/haunted house tale. Current obsession is with paper, notebooks, and pens, specifically Travelers Notebooks. Academic projects currently include Multicultural Speculative Fictions, Black Speculative Fictions, World SF, Inquiry Based Writing Pedagogies, and Creative Writing Pedagogies. A bit of a foodie and sometimes cook and bake as well.

Deep in the heart of the woods, there once lived a tree that spent its years gathering stories from every creature of the forest. Over time it learned to craft a human body for itself, so that it may travel to distant lands to find tales it had never known. Some say it still lives in a secret grove, waiting to be discovered, and eager to share its collection with all who come to visit.

Its me. I'm the tree. Nice to meet you :)

#pngtuber #vtuber #livestream #twitch #stories #writing #poetry
